translations: 愤世嫉俗者；玩世不恭者；犬儒主义者（cynic 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Others believe it will subvert relations within the family; cynics dubbed it the "Sue Your Son" law.
sentences.translation: 另外一些人认为这会破坏家庭关系；愤世嫉俗者称之为 “起诉你儿子” 的法律。

sentences.sentence: Cynics will say that there is not the slightest chance of success.
sentences.translation: 悲观的人会说根本不可能取得成功。

sentences.sentence: Of course, Republicans aren't the only cynics.
sentences.translation: 当然，共和党不是唯一的犬儒主义者。
